value.title: Soniox taps unsupervised learning to build speech recognition systems
value.excerpt: Soniox, a startup developing speech recognition systems that improve via unsupervised learning, has launched in general availability.

value.title: DeepScribe raises $5.3M to transcribe medical notes with AI
value.excerpt: DeepScribe, a company developing a platform for health note transcription, has raised $5.3 million in seed funding.

value.title: IBM's CEO says it's leaving consumer AI like facial recognition to other companies, as it doubles down on pitching Watson to businesses
value.excerpt: Dialing back its consumer AI ambitions, CEO Arvind Krishna said IBM is solely focused on business use cases like automating IT and customer service.

value.title: Campaigners call for Spotify to disavow ‘dangerous’ speech recognition patent
value.excerpt: Campaigners have demanded that Spotify renounces a patent for speech recognition tech that recommends music based on a user's mood, gender, age, or accent.

value.title: New AI Tool Offers Subtitling and Dubbing Alternative

value.title: Focus on “Big Science”, the collaborative project for the development of an efficient open source language model
value.excerpt: In order to develop an efficient open source multilingual language model in one year, several laboratories, large groups and start-ups have come together. They will use the French supercomputer Jean Zay to carry out the “Big Science”project.

value.title: Google-led paper pushes back against claims of AI inefficiency
